overview:
Andrew is a creative powerhouse and serial entrepreneur. He brings more than eighteen years of experience as an Investment Banker, Incubation Specialist and international business executive to the firm.

When it comes to the mobile space Andrewâ€™s passion and experience combine to bring our clients a unique perspective on ways to connect with their customers and attract their target market. Ideas pour forth from Andrew at such a clip that sometimes we have to tie him down just so we can catch up.

At Innovate-M, Andrew is focusing on consumer-oriented technology sectors, with a particular emphasis on emerging growth opportunities.

Prior to Joining Innovate-M, Andrew was the Founder and President of INOV8 Mobile, an earlier pioneer of live mobile streaming video. INOV8â€™s flagship product â€œWatchdogâ€ was selected as â€œThe Best New Emerging Technologyâ€ at the 2003 Consumer Electronics Show. Previously, Andrew was the Managing Director of Pabulum Ventures, a San Francisco-based Internet Incubator specializing in WAP technologies. Earlier in his career, he served as Principal at Palisades-GMB Capital Partners, a boutique Investment Bank, specializing in the gaming and emerging technology sectors.
